verses.verse: And <WG2532> I saw <WG1492> another <WG243> mighty <WG2478> angel <WG32> come down <WG2597> from <WG1537> heaven, <WG3772> clothed with <WG4016> a cloud: <WG3507> and <WG2532> a rainbow <WG2463> was upon <WG1909> his head, <WG2776> and <WG2532> his <WG848> face <WG4383> was as it were <WG5613> the <WG3588> sun, <WG2246> and <WG2532> his <WG848> feet <WG4228> as <WG5613> pillars <WG4769> of fire: <WG4442>

And <WG2532> he had <WG2192> in <WG1722> his <WG848> hand <WG5495> a little book <WG974> open: <WG455> and <WG2532> he set <WG5087> his <WG848> right <WG1188> foot <WG4228> upon <WG1909> the <WG3588> sea, <WG2281> and <WG1161> his left <WG2176> foot on <WG1909> the <WG3588> earth, <WG1093>

And <WG2532> cried <WG2896> with a loud <WG3173> voice, <WG5456> as <WG5618> when a lion <WG3023> roareth: <WG3455> and <WG2532> when <WG3753> he had cried, <WG2896> seven <WG2033> thunders <WG1027> uttered <WG2980> their <WG1438> voices. <WG5456>

And <WG2532> when <WG3753> the <WG3588> seven <WG2033> thunders <WG1027> had uttered <WG2980> their <WG1438> voices, <WG5456> I was about <WG3195> to write: <WG1125> and <WG2532> I heard <WG191> a voice <WG5456> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> saying <WG3004> unto me, <WG3427> Seal up <WG4972> those things which <WG3739> the <WG3588> seven <WG2033> thunders <WG1027> uttered, <WG2980> and <WG2532> write <WG1125> them <WG5023> not. <WG3361>

And <WG2532> the <WG3588> angel <WG32> which <WG3739> I saw <WG1492> stand <WG2476> upon <WG1909> the <WG3588> sea <WG2281> and <WG2532> upon <WG1909> the <WG3588> earth <WG1093> lifted up <WG142> his <WG848> hand <WG5495> to <WG1519> heaven, <WG3772>

And <WG2532> swore <WG3660> by <WG1722> him that liveth <WG2198> forever and ever, <WG1519> <WG165> <WG165> who <WG3739> created <WG2936> heaven, <WG3772> and <WG2532> the things <WG3588> that therein <WG1722> <WG846> are, and <WG2532> the <WG3588> earth, <WG1093> and <WG2532> the things <WG3588> that therein <WG1722> <WG846> are, and <WG2532> the <WG3588> sea, <WG2281> and <WG2532> the things <WG3588> which are therein, <WG1722> <WG846> that <WG3754> there should be <WG2071> time <WG5550> no <WG3756> longer: <WG2089>

But <WG235> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> days <WG2250> of the <WG3588> voice <WG5456> of the <WG3588> seventh <WG1442> angel, <WG32> when <WG3752> he shall begin <WG3195> to sound, <WG4537> the <WG3588> mystery <WG3466> of God <WG2316> should be finished, <WG5055> as <WG5613> he hath declared <WG2097> to his <WG1438> servants <WG1401> the <WG3588> prophets. <WG4396>

And <WG2532> the <WG3588> voice <WG5456> which <WG3739> I heard <WG191> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> spake <WG2980> unto <WG3326> me <WG1700> again, <WG3825> and <WG2532> said, <WG3004> Go <WG5217> and take <WG2983> the <WG3588> little book <WG974> which is open <WG455> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> hand <WG5495> of the angel <WG32> which standeth <WG2476> upon <WG1909> the <WG3588> sea <WG2281> and <WG2532> upon <WG1909> the <WG3588> earth. <WG1093>

And <WG2532> I went <WG565> unto <WG4314> the <WG3588> angel, <WG32> and said <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> Give <WG1325> me <WG3427> the <WG3588> little book. <WG974> And <WG2532> he said <WG3004> unto me, <WG3427> Take <WG2983> it, and <WG2532> eat it up; <WG2719> <WG846> and <WG2532> it shall make thy belly bitter, <WG4087> <WG4675> <WG2836> but <WG235> it shall be <WG2071> in <WG1722> thy <WG4675> mouth <WG4750> sweet <WG1099> as <WG5613> honey. <WG3192>

And <WG2532> I took <WG2983> the <WG3588> little book <WG974> out of <WG1537> the <WG3588> angel's <WG32> hand, <WG5495> and <WG2532> ate it up; <WG2719> <WG846> and <WG2532> it was <WG2258> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> mouth <WG4750> sweet <WG1099> as <WG5613> honey: <WG3192> and <WG2532> as soon as <WG3753> I had eaten <WG5315> it, <WG846> my <WG3450> belly <WG2836> was bitter. <WG4087>

And <WG2532> he said <WG3004> unto me, <WG3427> Thou <WG4571> must <WG1163> prophesy <WG4395> again <WG3825> before <WG1909> many <WG4183> peoples, <WG2992> and <WG2532> nations, <WG1484> and <WG2532> tongues, <WG1100> and <WG2532> kings. <WG935>
